<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get array with all assigned items. The resulting Array is sorted like: [<Map>, <Compass>, <Watch>, <Radio>, <GPS>, <NVG>, <Binoculars>]. But if something is missing it get's omitted so you can not be sure that some element is at a constant index. To return stored items see [[items]] and [[itemsWithMagazines]].
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''assignedItems''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> [[hint]] [[str]] [[assignedItems]] [[player]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[assignItem]], [[unassignItem]], [[linkItem]], [[unlinkItem]], [[addItem]], [[removeItem]], [[removeAllAssignedItems]], [[items]], [[itemsWithMagazines]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 18, 2013 - 14:20
<dt class="note">[[User:Druid|Druid]]<dd class="note">Arma 3, version 0.70 - headgear and goggles are not present in returned array now.<br>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 22, 2013 - 17:50
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone_Kid|Killzone_Kid]]<dd class="note">For head gear use [[headgear]], [[addHeadgear]] and [[removeHeadgear]]. For goggles use [[goggles]], [[addGoggles]] and [[removeGoggles]]<br>
